statements: DELETE FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE collaborator = 'Company XYZ';
DELETE FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE id = 100 AND theme = 'Privacy';
DELETE FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE collaborator = 'Company A' AND description LIKE '%ethical%'
DELETE FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE researcher_id = 100 AND created_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM ar_development_projects WHERE project_id IN (5, 8, 12)
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2 AND organization = 'Tech Institute';
DELETE FROM Ethicists WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND affiliation = 'University of Ethics';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE specialization = 'AI Ethics';
